model.name: n_tau
model.title: N-tau model parameters

model.name: from_file
model.title: Read column file
model.docu: Column file where # is the comment symbol, tabs and/or spaces as separators. Expected columns: (freq [Hz]) (N* [*]) (tau [s]) For values of N, see "Type of Index" explanation

Dimensional values of flame transfer function gain and delay. [section='N':] Gain of Flame Transfer Function (see table). [section='tau':] Delay of Flame Transfer Function in s [image=ntau_conventions.gif; caption=Conventions for N.]
Note: if you are reloading an existing flame, only N2 is stored (as this is the value used by AVSP), hence the N2 values will be displayed. If several frequencies were given, the n_tau file is re-written from the flame, and referenced.

model.name: analytical3D_cylinder
model.title: Cylinder
model.docu: Locate where the flame (i.e. specified N and Tau values) is imposed in the AVSP initial solution. The flame is assumed compact and located in a cartesian volume. [section='x, y, z' :] Coordinates of center of the first (e.g. bottom) cylinder disc [section='radius' :] Radius of the cylinder [section='u_x, u_y, u_z' :] Coordinates of the vector defining the cylinder axis (center of first disc to center of second)

model.docu: Reference vector is stored as unit vector. If you reload a (1, 1, 0) vector, it's values will be changed to (1/sqrt(2), 1/sqrt(2), 0), but it's still pointing in the same direction.
